activities: We may passively collect information from you when working with Aginity.com and Aginity applications. This information does not include identifiers such as name, address, or street address. Information we collect through Application usage statistics is anonymized or de-identified, unless collection of that information is explicitly stated within scope of a client engagement. We collect limited personally identifiable information through the Site and Licensing process. This personally identifiable information may include name, email address, company, role and phone number.
privacyprograms: Aginity adheres to a self-regulatory privacy program in consistent with the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
